articles.title: MARTIN KEOWN: Erik ten Hag has shown us the template for his new-look Manchester United team - Daily Mail
articles.description: MARTIN KEOWN: Manchester United's fans must have been rubbing their eyes in disbelief during Wednesday's win over Tottenham. They had not seen such a complete performance in years.
